actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution to refer the bill (S. 2980) entitled "A bill for the relief of Elizabeth Blanton" to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims for a report thereon.

summary.text: Refers S. 2980, entitled "A bill for the relief of Elizabeth Blanton," to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims for a report thereon.

titles.title: A resolution to refer the bill (S. 2980) entitled "A bill for the relief of Elizabeth Blanton" to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims for a report thereon.
